summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 13 to 24, inclusive, Block 3; Lots 1 to 25, inclusive, Block 4; and Lot 6, Block 1, Hebb's Avion City Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-68 and 17-42, respectively.
